title: AP Trap building is bad atm. Even on ADCs. ADCs are basically locked out of defensive itemisation.
body:
0 Counter to tanks. I understand them doing their Job is having a 1K Damage burst rotation, but that really doesn't scale off late game. They don't really need much to turn team fights. Put two of these on one team, A Trundle and a Thresh and you will have issues all game.

Blade of the Ruined King is trash Tier. Liandry's is just as Trash.

Pick 2 tanks? Congratulations, you are now absolutely sh-t Champions but if everyone doesn't put in 100% and know the game on many levels, you can just run in and 1v3 for 30 seconds then walk away - trade won. I understand the concept of dealing with bonus stat stacking teams, team compositions and %DMG against HP Stackers, counter-stats and how fights end up translating from the Champions present and stat shredding etc; but this whole pick a few tanks thing is the most annoying crap in the game. They slow it down, they're boring as F. Most of them are easy mode and you gave us 0 options once in game to focus them (Why?) (It's called a 4 person frontline that DOES DAMAGE). Retards.
